Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph class. A container for arcs and nodes of the simulation.

      • shortestPath

        public java.util.List<Node> shortestPath(Node from,
                                         Node to)
        Compute the shortest path from the specified nodes using the DefaultLengthCosts. Notice that this is quite inefficient, and should only be used in the case of a non-geographical graph and if no other heuristics are available.
        Parameters:
        from - source node
        to - target node
        Returns:
        Shortest path between nodes as a node list
